nodes.text: Gaming the Expanded Universe: Ten Years of Knights of the Old Republic

Gaming the Expanded Universe: Ten Years of Knights of the Old Republic is an article by Michael Kogge about the making of the video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic, which was released ten years earlier, on July 15, 2003 for the Xbox and several months later for computers. It was published in Star Wars Insider 144 and later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2015.
